channel.title: Steam patching issues
channel.description:

Can't play the game! Steam wont seem to patch the game.

#### Comments:

item.title: Steam patching issues
item.dc:creator: babbylegs
item.description:
Update: Game WORKS in vulkan mode but I get a notification of being out of date in the bottom right on the splash screen.
